titles.title: Coastal Barrier Resources Reauthorization Act of 2005
Coastal Barrier Resources Reauthorization Act of 2005
Coastal Barrier Resources Reauthorization Act of 2005
Coastal Barrier Resources Reauthorization Act of 2005
Coastal Barrier Resources Reauthorization Act of 2005
Coastal Barrier Resources Reauthorization Act of 2005
A bill to reauthorize the Coastal Barrier Resources Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Inhofe with an amendment. With written report No. 109-179.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 286.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries and Oceans.
Subcommittee on Fisheries and Oceans Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 109-428.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 236.

action.text: Mr. Radanovich moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 1869.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/25/2006--Public Law. Coastal Barrier Resources Reauthorization Act of 2005 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to report to Congress on the creation of digital maps of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System units and other protected areas under the digital mapping pilot project. Authorizes appropriations for FY2006-FY2007. Requires the Secretary to carry out a project to create digital versions of all the remaining John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System maps, including maps of protected areas not included in the pilot project. Authorizes appropriations for FY2006-FY2010.
